questions.question: Why is it important to know who created a source?

choices.answer: It influences how valuable it is to a historian

questions.question: What is the VALUE of this source to historians studying early 21st Century Rap Music? (Several answers correct)

choices.answer: It shows the variety of Rap music available
It shows fan responses to the new release
It shows what a famous rapper did in the 21st Century
It shows that Rappers used Social media to communicate with their fans

questions.question: What is the LIMITATION of this source to historians studying early 21st Century Rap Music? (Several answers correct)

choices.answer: It is limited because this source shows just one particular rap artist

It is just one social media platform and only shows a few responses.
It is limited bc I don't like Kanye West
